pt.ua.dicoogle.sdk.core

Interface DicooglePlatformInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DicooglePlatformProxy, PlatformInterfaceMock

    public interface DicooglePlatformInterface
    Interface for accessing external functionalities of the platform, including other plugins' interfaces.

    For instance, if a graphical plugin needs to query, it will able to access query providers with this platform.

    See Also:
    QueryInterface, IndexerInterface, StorageInterface

                                                  java.lang.Object... args)

        Parameters:
        location - the location to retrieve
        args - a variable list of extra parameters for the retrieve
        Returns:
        an iterable of storage input streams

      • getStoragePlugins

        java.util.Collection<StorageInterface> getStoragePlugins(boolean onlyEnabled)
        Obtains all installed storage plugins.
        Parameters:
        onlyEnabled - whether only enabled plugins should be retrieved (all are retrieved if false)
        Returns:
        a collection of storage plugin interfaces

        Parameters:
        scheme - the storage scheme
        Returns:

        Returns:

      • getQueryProviderByName

                                      boolean onlyEnabled)
        Gets the query provider with the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - the unique name of the provider
        onlyEnabled - whether only enabled plugins should be retrieved (all are retrieved if false)
        Returns:
        a collection of unique query provider names

      • queryAll

        JointQueryTask queryAll(JointQueryTask holder,
                        java.lang.String query,
                        java.lang.Object... parameters)
        Easily performs a query over all query providers. This operation is asynchronous and returns immediately.
        Parameters:
        holder - a query task holder containing callback methods
        query - a string describing the query
        parameters - a variable list of extra parameters for the query
        Returns:
        a join query task

      • queryAll

        JointQueryTask queryAll(JointQueryTask holder,
                        java.lang.String query,
                        DimLevel level,
                        java.lang.Object... parameters)
        Easily performs a query over all query providers. This operation is asynchronous and returns immediately.
        Parameters:
        holder - a query task holder containing callback methods
        query - a string describing the query
        level - level of the query
        parameters - a variable list of extra parameters for the query
        Returns:
        a join query task

      • query

        Task<java.lang.Iterable<SearchResult>> query(java.lang.String querySource,
                                             java.lang.String query,
                                             java.lang.Object... parameters)
        Easily performs a query over a specific provider. This operation is asynchronous and returns immediately.
        Parameters:
        querySource - the name of the query provider to issue
        query - a string describing the query
        parameters - a variable list of extra parameters for the query
        Returns:
        an asynchronous task containing the results

      • query

        JointQueryTask query(JointQueryTask holder,
                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> querySources,
                     java.lang.String query,
                     java.lang.Object... parameters)
        Easily performs a query over multiple providers. This operation is asynchronous and returns immediately.
        Parameters:
        holder - a query task holder containing callback methods
        querySources - a list of names of query providers to issue
        query - a string describing the query
        parameters - a variable list of extra parameters for the query
        Returns:
        an asynchronous task containing the results

      • index

        java.util.List<Task<Report>> index(java.net.URI path)
        Easily performs an indexation procedure over all active indexers. This operation is asynchronous and returns immediately.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to index
        Returns:
        a list of asynchronous tasks, one for each provider

      • indexBlocking

        java.util.List<Report> indexBlocking(java.net.URI path)
        Easily performs an indexation procedure over all active indexers. This operation is synchronous and will wait until all providers have finished indexing.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to index
        Returns:
        a list of reports, one for each provider

      • getSettings

        ServerSettingsReader getSettings()
        Obtain access to the server's settings.
        Returns:
        an object for read-only access to the settings
